languages.text: "Мастер шепотов, что творится на моем корабле? {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}-сеть молчит и Мастер вокса не выходит на связь, на офицерскую палубу проникли вооруженные люди, а по пути сюда архмилитант уничтожил еще нескольких еретиков. Тяжелый случай {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-психоза? Часть экипажа сошла с ума и забыла, кто они и кому служат?!"

traits.locale_text: "Мастер Шепотов, что творится на моем корабле? {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}-сеть молчит и Мастер вокса не выходит на связь, на офицерскую палубу проникли вооруженные люди, а по пути сюда архимилитант уничтожил еще нескольких еретиков. Тяжелый случай {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-психоза? Часть экипажа сошла с ума и забыла, кто они и кому служат?!"

languages.text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"
languages.original_text: "Мастер шепотов, что творится на моем корабле? {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Вокс{/g}-сеть молчит и Мастер вокса не выходит на связь, на офицерскую палубу проникли вооруженные люди, а по пути сюда архмилитант уничтожил еще нескольких еретиков. Тяжелый случай {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}варп{/g}-психоза? Часть экипажа сошла с ума и забыла, кто они и кому служат?!"

Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Has some of my crew lost their minds and forgot who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

languages.text: “低语之主，我的船上到底发生了什么事情？{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵网络{/g}没有回应，音阵大师联系不上。全副武装的敌人闯进了军官甲板，而我的首席战士在回来的路上还消灭了几个异端分子。这是严重的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}干扰吗？是不是我的一部分船员发了疯？他们是不是忘记了自己是谁，也忘记了他们应该为谁效力？立刻报告！”
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: “低语之主，我的船上到底发生了什么事情？{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}音阵网络{/g}没有回应，音阵大师联系不上。全副武装的敌人闯进了军官甲板，而我的首席战士在回来的路上还消灭了几个异教徒。这是严重的{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}亚空间{/g}干扰吗？是不是我的一部分船员发了疯？他们是不是忘记了自己是谁，也忘记了他们应该为谁效力？立刻报告！”

languages.text: «Maestro de susurros, ¿qué ocurre en mi nave? La {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}red de vocos{/g} está en silencio, la maestra de vocos no responde, unos asaltantes armados han invadido la cubierta de oficiales y mi Archimilitante acaba de destruir a más herejes en su camino hasta aquí. ¿Es un caso grave de locura de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}? ¿Acaso la tripulación ha perdido la cordura y ha olvidado quién es y a quién sirve? ¡Informe!».
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: «Maestro de susurros, ¿qué ocurre en mi nave? La {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}red de vocos{/g} está en silencio, la maestra de vocos no responde, unos asaltantes armados han invadido la cubierta de oficiales y mi Archimilitante acaba de destruir a más herejes en su camino hasta aquí. ¿Es un caso grave de locura de la {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}disformidad{/g}? ¿Acaso la tripulación ha perdido la cordura y ha olvidado quién es y a quién sirve? ¡Informe!».

languages.text: 「囁きの主、私の船で何が起こっているのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスネット{/g}は沈黙しており、ヴォクス・マスターは応答していません。武装した襲撃者が士官デッキを襲撃し、私のアーク・ミリタントはここに来る途中でさらに数人の異端者を撃破した。これは深刻な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の狂気なのか？私のクルーの何人かが正気を失い、自分たちが何者で、誰に仕えているかを忘れてしまった者もいるのですか？報告せよ！」
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: 「囁きの主、私の船で何が起こっているのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスネット{/g}は沈黙しており、ヴォクスマスターは応答していません。武装した襲撃者が士官のデッキを襲撃し、私のアーク・ミリタントはここに来る途中でさらに数人の異端者を破壊した。これは深刻な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}狂気のケースなのか？私のクルーの何人かが正気を失い、自分たちが何者で誰に仕えているかを忘れたのか？報告せよ！」

「囁きの主、私の船で何が起こっているのですか？{g|Encyclopedia:Vox}ヴォクスネット{/g}は沈黙しており、ヴォクス・マスターは応答していません。武装した襲撃者が士官デッキを襲撃し、私のアーク・ミリタントはここに来る途中でさらに数人の異端者を撃破した。これは深刻な{g|Encyclopedia:Warp}<歪み>{/g}の狂気なのか？私のクルーの何人かが正気を失い、自分たちが何者で、誰に仕えているかを忘れてしまった者もいるのですか？報告せよ！」

languages.text: « Maître des murmures, que se passe-t-il à bord de mon vaisseau ? Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}réseau-vox{/g} est muet, la maîtresse-vox ne répond pas, des assaillants armés ont pris d'assaut le pont des officiers et mon archimilitant a exécuté d'autres hérétiques en venant ici. S'agit-il d'un cas de folie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? Certains membres de mon équipage auraient-ils perdu la raison ou oublié qui ils servent ? Au rapport ! »
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: « Maître des murmures, que se passe-t-il à bord de mon vaisseau ? Le {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}réseau-vox{/g} est muet, la maîtresse-vox ne répond pas, des assaillants armés ont pris d'assaut le pont des officiers et mon archimilitant a exécuté d'autres hérétiques en venant ici. S'agit-il d'un cas de folie du {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g} ? Certains membres de mon équipage auraient-ils perdu la raison ou oublié qui ils servent ? Au rapport ! »

languages.text: "Meister des Geflüsters, was geht auf meinem Schiff vor? Das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Netz{/g} ist verstummt, die Voxmeisterin antwortet nicht, bewaffnete Angreifer haben das Offiziersdeck gestürmt, und mein Erzmilitant hat soeben auf dem Weg hierher weitere Ketzer vernichtet. Ist das ein schwerer Fall von {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Wahnsinn? Hat ein Teil meiner Crew den Verstand verloren und vergessen, wer sie sind und wem sie dienen? Erstattet Bericht!"
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: "Meister des Geflüsters, was geht auf meinem Schiff vor? Das {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Vox-Netz{/g} ist verstummt, die Voxmeisterin antwortet nicht, bewaffnete Angreifer haben das Offiziersdeck gestürmt, und mein Erzmilitant hat soeben auf dem Weg hierher weitere Ketzer vernichtet. Ist das ein schwerer Fall von {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}Warp{/g}-Wahnsinn? Hat ein Teil meiner Crew den Verstand verloren und vergessen, wer sie sind und wem sie dienen? Erstattet Bericht!"

languages.text: "Fısıltı Üstadı, gemimde neler oluyor? {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks ağı{/g} sessiz, Voks Üstadı yanıt vermiyor ve silahlı saldırganlar subay güvertesini basıyor. Yetmezmiş gibi Başmilitanım, buraya gelirken önünü kesen birkaç kâfiri daha gebertiyor. Ciddi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} deliliği vakasıyla karşı karşıya mıyız? Mürettebatımda aklını yitirip kim olduğunu ve kime hizmet ettiğini unutanlar mı var? Rapor ver!"
languages.original_text: "Master of Whispers, what is happening on my ship? The {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}vox-net{/g} is silent, the Vox Master is not responding, armed assailants have stormed the officers' deck, and my Arch-Militant just destroyed several more heretics on the way here. Is this a severe case of {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}warp{/g} madness? Have some of my crew lost their minds and forgotten who they are and whom they serve? Report!"

traits.locale_text: "Fısıltı Üstadı, gemimde neler oluyor? {g|Encyclopedia:Vox}Voks ağı{/g} sessiz, Voks Üstadı yanıt vermiyor ve silahlı saldırganlar subay güvertesini basıyor. Yetmezmiş gibi Başmilitan'ım buraya gelirken önünü kesen birkaç kâfiri daha gebertiyor. Ciddi bir {g|Encyclopedia:Warp}öte{/g} deliliği vakasıyla karşı karşıya mıyız? Mürettebatımda aklını yitirip kim olduğunu ve kime hizmet ettiğini unutanlar mı var? Rapor ver!"
